"Loading" - Text when a screen is loadin: "Back" - Button text to go back
"Cancel" - Button text to cancel something
"Submit" - Button text to submit something
"Username" - Username label
"Password" - Password label
"Login" - Button text. Button logs the player in to the game
"Invalid username or password" - Invalid Credentials warning
"Unable to connect to the internet. Please check your connection." - Warning when unable to connect to the internet
Caricamento: Impossibile connettersi ad internet. Per favore controlla la tua connessione

"Loading" - Text when a screen is loadin: "Register" - Register account button text
"Email" - Register account email input label
Create game "Anonymous" setting label
Create game "Players" number slider label
Create game "Ranked" mode toggle label
"Create Game" title label
"Events" in game panel title
"Chat" in game panel title
"Events" in game GUI panel title
"Logs" in game GUI panel title
"Stats" in game GUI panel title
"Anonymous" - Game lobby anonymous mode identifier label
"Lobby" - Game lobby default title while in lobby
"Ended" - Button text to filter out only ended games while in game select menu
"Ongoing" - Button text to filter out only currently ongoing games that you are in
"Open" - Button text to filter out only open lobbies that you can join while in game select menu
"Players" - A label indicating how many players are in a game on the game-select screen.
Title for the game select screen
"Create Account" - button text on the login screen to create an account.
-- dont know what this is yet. Will be a warning message if the user inputs invalid characters or doesn't meet password requirements.
"No Account?" button which takes the user to an account registration page.
"Account" button. Appears on the main menu for users to manage their account
"Help" button. Appears on the main menu for users looking for extra help.
"Multiplayer" - Button text on the main menu. When clicked will take you to a screen to search for multiplayer games.
"Puzzles" - Button text. When clicked takes users to a puzzles page.
"Settings" button text. When clicked will take the users to a settings screen.
"The email you have entered is invalid" - Text that appears when a user doesn't enter a valid email when registering for an account.
"The password does not meet the password requirements" - Error when registering for an account
Caricamento: La password non riscontra i requisiti

"Loading" - Text when a screen is loadin: "Your username must be between 8-20 characters" - Error when registering for an account
Caricamento: Il tuo nome deve contenere dagli 8 ai 20 caratteri

"Loading" - Text when a screen is loadin: "Create Game" - button label, when clicked creates a new game
"Create Game" - The title of the create game screen
"Create Game" - Button text, on the game creation screen, this button will officially create the game.
"New Chat" - Button text, in game button for creating a new chat group.
"Chats" - GUI title text for the chat panel in game.
"Launch" - Button text, Button will confirm launching an attack at your enemies.
"Cancel Game" - Button text. When pressed, closes the game lobby and cancels the match.
"Join game" - Button text. Button to join a game
"Leave game" - Button text. Button to leave a game lobby you have joined before it begins.
"Start Early" - Button text. Button will start a game before the maximum number of players have joined. Only usable by the game's creator.
"Launch Sub" - In game launch sub panel title.
"Waiting for players" - Game lobby label. Appears when the game is waiting for more players to join the game.
